trans-unit.target: Description de la migration Azure SQL
Ouvrir les blocs-notes de migration Azure SQL
Détails de la base de données
Détails de la cible Azure SQL
Copier les détails de la migration

trans-unit.source: This is a blocking issue that will prevent the database migration from succeeding.
trans-unit.target: Il s’agit d’un problème bloquant qui empêche la migration de la base de données de réussir.

trans-unit.source:
We are assessing the databases in your SQL server instance {0} to identify the right Azure SQL target.
This may take some time.
trans-unit.target:
Nous évaluons les bases de données de votre instance SQL Server {0} pour identifier la cible Azure SQL appropriée.
Cela peut prendre un certain temps.

trans-unit.source: Based on the assessment results, all {0} of your database(s) in an online state can be migrated to Azure SQL.
trans-unit.target: Based on the assessment results, all {0} of your database(s) in an online state can be migrated to Azure SQL.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while assessing the server '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: An error occurred while assessing the server '{0}'.

trans-unit.source: SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine (IaaS)
trans-unit.target: SQL Server dans une machine virtuelle Azure (laaS)

trans-unit.source: Select your target Azure subscription and your target Azure SQL Managed Instance
trans-unit.target: Sélectionnez votre abonnement Azure cible et votre Azure SQL Managed Instance cible.

trans-unit.source: Select your target Azure Subscription and your target SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine for your target.
trans-unit.target: Sélectionnez votre abonnement Azure cible et votre SQL Server cible sur la machine virtuelle Azure pour votre cible.

trans-unit.source: To migrate to Azure SQL Managed Instance (PaaS), view assessment results and select one or more database(s).
trans-unit.target: To migrate to Azure SQL Managed Instance (PaaS), view assessment results and select one or more database(s).

trans-unit.source: To migrate to SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine (IaaS), view assessment results and select one or more database(s).
trans-unit.target: To migrate to SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine (IaaS), view assessment results and select one or more database(s).

trans-unit.source: To continue, select a target database.
trans-unit.target: To continue, select a target database.

trans-unit.source: We have completed the assessment of your SQL Server Instance '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: Nous avons terminé l’évaluation de votre instance SQL Server « {0} ».

trans-unit.source: {0} out of {1} databases can be migrated
trans-unit.target: {0} bases de données {1} peuvent être migrées

trans-unit.source: Databases that are not ready for migration to Azure SQL Managed Instance can be migrated to SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines.
trans-unit.target: Les bases de données qui ne sont pas prêtes pour la migration vers Azure SQL Managed Instance peuvent être migrées vers SQL Server sur Azure Machines Virtuelles.

trans-unit.source: Select an Azure account linked to Azure Data Studio, or link one now.
trans-unit.target: Select an Azure account linked to Azure Data Studio, or link one now.

trans-unit.source: Add a linked account and then try again.
trans-unit.target: Add a linked account and then try again.

trans-unit.source: The access token for selected account '{0}' is no longer valid. Select 'Link Account' and refresh the account, or select a different account.
trans-unit.target: The access token for selected account '{0}' is no longer valid. Select 'Link Account' and refresh the account, or select a different account.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while accessing the selected account '{0}'. Select 'Link Account' and refresh the account, or select a different account. Error '{1}'
trans-unit.target: An error occurred while accessing the selected account '{0}'. Select 'Link Account' and refresh the account, or select a different account. Error '{1}'
Sauvegarde de la base de données

trans-unit.source: Select the location of your database backups to use for migration.
trans-unit.target: Sélectionnez l’emplacement de vos sauvegardes de base de données à utiliser pour la migration.

trans-unit.source: My database backups are on a network share
trans-unit.target: Les sauvegardes de ma base de données sont sur un partage réseau

trans-unit.source: My database backups are in an Azure Storage Blob Container
trans-unit.target: Mes sauvegardes de base de données se trouvent dans un conteneur Azure Storage Blob

trans-unit.source: Provide the network share location that contains backups and the user credentials that has read access to the share
trans-unit.target: Indiquez l’emplacement du partage réseau contenant les sauvegardes et les informations d’identification de l’utilisateur disposant d’un accès en lecture sur le partage

trans-unit.source: Network share location that contains backups.
trans-unit.target: Emplacement du partage réseau qui contient des sauvegardes.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that the service account running the source SQL Server instance has read privileges on the network share.
trans-unit.target: Vérifiez que le compte de service exécutant l'instance source de SQL Server a des privilèges de lecture sur le partage réseau.

trans-unit.source: Windows user account with read access to the network share location.
trans-unit.target: Compte d’utilisateur Windows avec accès en lecture à l’emplacement du partage réseau.

trans-unit.source: Provide the Azure storage account where backups will be uploaded to.
trans-unit.target: Indiquez le compte de stockage Azure sur lequel les sauvegardes seront chargées.

trans-unit.source: Select a unique name for this target database
trans-unit.target: Sélectionnez un nom unique pour cette base de données cible

trans-unit.source: Database '{0}' already exists on the target managed instance '{1}'.
trans-unit.target: Database '{0}' already exists on the target managed instance '{1}'.

trans-unit.source: Select the subscription that contains the storage account.
trans-unit.target: Sélectionnez l’abonnement qui contient le compte de stockage.

trans-unit.source: To migrate to the Azure SQL target, choose a migration mode based on your downtime requirements.
trans-unit.target: To migrate to the Azure SQL target, choose a migration mode based on your downtime requirements.

trans-unit.source: Application downtime is limited to cutover at the end of migration.
trans-unit.target: Application downtime is limited to cutover at the end of migration.

trans-unit.source: Application downtime will start when the migration starts.
trans-unit.target: Le temps d’arrêt de l’application va démarrer lorsque la migration démarre.

trans-unit.source: To continue, select a valid subscription.
trans-unit.target: To continue, select a valid subscription.

trans-unit.source: To continue, select a valid location.
trans-unit.target: To continue, select a valid location.

trans-unit.source: To continue, select a valid storage account.
trans-unit.target: To continue, select a valid storage account.

trans-unit.source: To continue, select a valid resource group for source database '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: To continue, select a valid resource group for source database '{0}'.

trans-unit.source: To continue, select a valid storage account for source database '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: To continue, select a valid storage account for source database '{0}'.

trans-unit.source: To continue, select a valid blob container for source database '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: To continue, select a valid blob container for source database '{0}'.

trans-unit.source: To continue, select a valid last backup file for source database '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: To continue, select a valid last backup file for source database '{0}'.

trans-unit.source: Invalid network share location format. Example: {0}
trans-unit.target: Format d’emplacement du partage réseau non valide. Exemple : {0}
Format de compte d’utilisateur non valide. Exemple : {0}

trans-unit.source: Enter a valid name for the target database.
trans-unit.target: Enter a valid name for the target database.

trans-unit.source: Provide a unique container for each target database. Databases affected:
trans-unit.target: Provide a unique container for each target database. Databases affected:

trans-unit.source: Enter the Windows Authentication credentials used to connect to SQL Server Instance {0}. These credentials will be used to connect to the SQL Server instance and identify valid backup file(s).
trans-unit.target: Enter the Windows Authentication credentials used to connect to SQL Server Instance {0}. These credentials will be used to connect to the SQL Server instance and identify valid backup file(s).

trans-unit.source: Enter the SQL Authentication credentials used to connect to SQL Server Instance {0}. ​These credentials will be used to connect to the SQL Server instance and identify valid backup file(s).
trans-unit.target: Enter the SQL Authentication credentials used to connect to SQL Server Instance {0}. ​These credentials will be used to connect to the SQL Server instance and identify valid backup file(s).

trans-unit.source: Select a resource group value first.
trans-unit.target: Sélectionnez d’abord une valeur de groupe de ressources.

trans-unit.source: Select a storage account value first.
trans-unit.target: Sélectionnez d’abord une valeur de compte de stockage.

trans-unit.source: Select a blob container value first.
trans-unit.target: Sélectionnez d’abord une valeur de conteneur d’objets Blob.

trans-unit.source: Azure Database Migration Service orchestrates database migration activities and tracks their progress. You can select an existing Database Migration Service as an Azure SQL target if you have created one previously, or create a new one below.
trans-unit.target: Azure Database Migration Service orchestrates database migration activities and tracks their progress. You can select an existing Database Migration Service as an Azure SQL target if you have created one previously, or create a new one below.

trans-unit.source: No Database Migration Service found. Create a new one
trans-unit.target: No Database Migration Service found. Create a new one

trans-unit.source: Select a valid Database Migration Service.
trans-unit.target: Select a valid Database Migration Service.

trans-unit.source: Select a Database Migration Service that is connected to a node.
trans-unit.target: Select a Database Migration Service that is connected to a node.

trans-unit.source: Any existing Azure Database Migration Service in the Azure portal do not appear in Azure Data Studio. Any Database Migration Service created in Azure Data Studio will not be visible in the Azure portal yet.
trans-unit.target: Any existing Azure Database Migration Service in the Azure portal do not appear in Azure Data Studio. Any Database Migration Service created in Azure Data Studio will not be visible in the Azure portal yet.

trans-unit.source: Enter the SQL Authentication credentials used to connect to SQL Server Instance {0}. These credentials will be used to connect to the SQL Server instance and identifying valid backup file(s).
trans-unit.target: Enter the SQL Authentication credentials used to connect to SQL Server Instance {0}. These credentials will be used to connect to the SQL Server instance and identifying valid backup file(s).

trans-unit.source: Azure Database Migration Service leverages Azure Data Factory's self-hosted integration runtime to upload backups from on-premises network fie share to Azure.
trans-unit.target: Azure Database Migration Service leverages Azure Data Factory's self-hosted integration runtime to upload backups from on-premises network fie share to Azure.

trans-unit.source: Follow the instructions below to setup self-hosted integration runtime.
trans-unit.target: Follow the instructions below to setup self-hosted integration runtime.
Télécharger et installer le runtime d'intégration

trans-unit.source: Step 2: Use this key to register your integration runtime
trans-unit.target: Étape 2 : Utilisez cette clé pour inscrire votre runtime d'intégration

trans-unit.source: Step 3: Click on 'Test connection' button to check the connection between Azure Database Migration Service and integration runtime
trans-unit.target: Step 3: Click on 'Test connection' button to check the connection between Azure Database Migration Service and integration runtime

trans-unit.source: Azure Database Migration Service is not registered. Azure Database Migration Service '{0}' needs to be registered with self-hosted integration runtime on any node.
trans-unit.target: Azure Database Migration Service is not registered. Azure Database Migration Service '{0}' needs to be registered with self-hosted integration runtime on any node.

trans-unit.source: Azure Database Migration Service '{0}' is connected to self-hosted integration runtime running on the node - {1}
trans-unit.target: Azure Database Migration Service '{0}' is connected to self-hosted integration runtime running on the node - {1}

trans-unit.source: To continue, select a valid resource group.
trans-unit.target: To continue, select a valid resource group.

trans-unit.source: Enter a valid name for the Migration Service.
trans-unit.target: Enter a valid name for the Migration Service.

trans-unit.source: No Migration Services found. To continue, create a new one.
trans-unit.target: No Migration Services found. To continue, create a new one.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while refreshing the migration service creation status.
trans-unit.target: An error occurred while refreshing the migration service creation status.

trans-unit.source: A resource group is a container that holds related resources for an Azure solution.
trans-unit.target: A resource group is a container that holds related resources for an Azure solution.

trans-unit.source: Successfully created a Database Migration Service.
trans-unit.target: Successfully created a Database Migration Service.

trans-unit.source: Failed to provision a Database Migration Service. Wait a few minutes and then try again.
trans-unit.target: Failed to provision a Database Migration Service. Wait a few minutes and then try again.

trans-unit.source: Learn more about things you need before starting a migration.
trans-unit.target: En savoir plus sur les éléments dont vous avez besoin avant de commencer une migration.

trans-unit.source: SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine
trans-unit.target: SQL Server dans une machine virtuelle Azure
Groupe de ressources du conteneur d’objets BLOB
Compte de stockage de conteneur d’objets blob

trans-unit.source: Azure Storage Account to Upload Backups
trans-unit.target: Compte stockage Azure pour le chargement des sauvegardes

trans-unit.source: Select the operation you'd like to perform
trans-unit.target: Sélectionnez l’opération que vous souhaitez effectuer

trans-unit.source: Failed to open the migration notebook
trans-unit.target: Failed to open the migration notebook

trans-unit.source: Determine the migration readiness of your SQL Server instances, identify a recommended Azure SQL target, and complete the migration of your SQL Server instance to Azure SQL Managed Instance or SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines.
trans-unit.target: Déterminez la préparation de la migration de vos instances SQL Server, identifiez une cible Azure SQL recommandée et effectuez la migration de votre instance SQL Server vers Azure SQL Managed Instance ou SQL Server sur Machines virtuelles Microsoft Azure.

trans-unit.source: Migrate SQL Server instance to Azure SQL.
trans-unit.target: Migrer l’instance SQL Server vers Azure SQL.
État de la migration de base de données

trans-unit.source: Assessment rules for Azure SQL Managed Instance
trans-unit.target: Règles d’évaluation pour Azure SQL Managed Instance

trans-unit.source: See the list of rules used to determine whether your SQL Server instance can be migrated to Azure SQL Managed Instance.
trans-unit.target: See the list of rules used to determine whether your SQL Server instance can be migrated to Azure SQL Managed Instance.

trans-unit.source: Things you need before starting migration:
trans-unit.target: Éléments dont vous avez besoin avant de démarrer la migration :

trans-unit.source: Azure SQL Managed Instance or SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine
trans-unit.target: Azure SQL Managed Instance ou SQL Server sur la machine virtuelle Azure
Migration de la base de données en cours
La base de données {0} contient des avertissements
{0} bases de données contiennent des avertissements
Commentaires sur l'expérience de la migration
Nom de la base de données source
Nom de la base de données cible

trans-unit.source: Last applied backup files taken on
trans-unit.target: Dernière application du ou des fichiers de sauvegarde effectuée le

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while refreshing the migration status.
trans-unit.target: An error occurred while refreshing the migration status.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while canceling the migration.
trans-unit.target: An error occurred while canceling the migration.
Heure de début de la sauvegarde

trans-unit.source: The cutover process cannot start until all the migrations are done. To return the latest file status, refresh your browser window.
trans-unit.target: The cutover process cannot start until all the migrations are done. To return the latest file status, refresh your browser window.

trans-unit.source: SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines
trans-unit.target: SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines
Copier les détails de la migration

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to cancel this migration?
Completing cutover without restoring all the backup(s) may result in a data loss.
trans-unit.target: Completing cutover without restoring all the backup(s) may result in a data loss.

trans-unit.source: A SQL Managed Instance migration cutover to the Business Critical service tier can take significantly longer than General Purpose because three secondary replicas have to be seeded for Always On High Availability group. The duration of the operation depends on the size of the data. Seeding speed in 90% of cases is 220 GB/hour or higher.
trans-unit.target: A SQL Managed Instance migration cutover to the Business Critical service tier can take significantly longer than General Purpose because three secondary replicas have to be seeded for Always On High Availability group. The duration of the operation depends on the size of the data. Seeding speed in 90% of cases is 220 GB/hour or higher.

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps before you complete cutover.
trans-unit.target: Effectuez les étapes suivantes avant de terminer le basculement.

trans-unit.source: 1. Stop all incoming transactions to the source database.
trans-unit.target: 1. Stop all incoming transactions to the source database.

trans-unit.source: 2. Take a final backup of the transaction log and store it in the network share location.
trans-unit.target: 2. Take a final backup of the transaction log and store it in the network share location.

trans-unit.source: 2. Take a final differential or backup of the transaction log and store it in the Azure Storage Blob Container.
trans-unit.target: 2. Take a final differential or backup of the transaction log and store it in the Azure Storage Blob Container.

trans-unit.source: 3. Verify that your backup(s) have been restored on the target database. The "Log backup(s) pending restore" value should be zero.
trans-unit.target: 3. Verify that your backup(s) have been restored on the target database. The "Log backup(s) pending restore" value should be zero.

trans-unit.source: 3. Verify that your backup(s) have been restored on the target database. The "Log backup(s) pending restore" value should be zero.
trans-unit.target: 3. Verify that your backup(s) have been restored on the target database. The "Log backup(s) pending restore" value should be zero.

trans-unit.source: I confirm there are no additional log backup(s) to provide and want to complete cutover.
trans-unit.target: Je confirme qu’il n’y a aucune sauvegarde de journal supplémentaire à fournir et je souhaite effectuer le basculement.
Basculement en cours pour la base de données « {0} »

trans-unit.source: Migration is not in progress and cannot be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Migration is not in progress and cannot be canceled.

trans-unit.source: Migration is not in progress and cannot be cutover.
trans-unit.target: La migration n’est pas en cours et ne peut pas être à basculement.

trans-unit.source: No pending backups. Click refresh to check current status.
trans-unit.target: Aucune sauvegarde en attente. Cliquez sur Actualiser pour vérifier l’état actuel.
Nom de la cible Azure SQL

trans-unit.source: Authentication keys used to connect to the self-hosted integration runtime node
trans-unit.target: Authentication keys used to connect to the self-hosted integration runtime node

trans-unit.source: Enter the credentials for the source SQL Server instance. These credentials will be used while migrating database(s) to Azure SQL.
trans-unit.target: Enter the credentials for the source SQL Server instance. These credentials will be used while migrating database(s) to Azure SQL.
Bases de données pour la migration

trans-unit.source: Select database(s) that you want to migrate to Azure SQL
trans-unit.target: Sélectionnez la ou les bases de données à migrer vers Azure SQL

trans-unit.source: Click on SQL Server Instance or any of the databases on the left to view its details.
trans-unit.target: Cliquez sur l’instance SQL Server ou sur l’une des bases de données à gauche pour afficher ses détails.

trans-unit.source: No issues found for migrating to SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine
trans-unit.target: Aucun problème n’a été trouvé pour la migration vers SQL Server sur la machine virtuelle Azure

trans-unit.source: No issues found for migrating to SQL Server on Azure SQL Managed Instance
trans-unit.target: Aucun problème n’a été trouvé pour la migration vers SQL Server sur Azure SQL Managed Instance
Démarrage de la migration de la base de données {0} vers {1} - {2}

trans-unit.target: Une erreur s'est produite lors du démarrage de la migration : « {0} »
